channel.title: At what point does the client begin to render an image?
channel.description:
Hey, basically, at what point does the client start to render an image? By that I mean, after receiving which packet, does the client start to form an image?
As it goes, i've sent all the packet up to the login response packet, (cba to list them all), then after that ive sent, Layer packet, the basic entities packet (sent in "bits", i dont quite understand this packet so any help is appreciated), the player wearing packet, the player stats packet and the player inventory packet.
After sending all this, im greeted with a black screen and just a bunch of pings.
Any help is appreciated :).
P.S. after 5 or so pings I lose connection and auto-reconnect, should I send anything to show the connection is still alive?

item.source: At what point does the client begin to render an image?

item.title: At what point does the client begin to render an image?
item.dc:creator: @Vrunk Vrunk
item.description:
@Vrunk wrote:

[quote=“ownagesbot, post:18, topic:214979”]Please refrain from trashing my thread…

Also, I found that it’s the mod packet thats the last packet sent before rendering.
Having said that, I still can’t get it to render, I fear my mod packet is wrong… but i’ve no idea why…[me=ownagesbot]thinks this is a pain in the ass but everything will become easy after he gets through this painstaking process.[/me][/quote]

I don’t even see a hint of validity in your original question.

The client is a visual representation of what goes on server-sidedly. There is no “magical packet” that tells the client to start rendering (unless you are referring to the initialization of the rendering loop due to client authentication). What exactly are you trying to accomplish here?

If you want us to answer a question, give us a question that can be answered. (that means DETAILS!)

Read full topic
item.source: At what point does the client begin to render an image?

Also, I found that it’s the mod packet thats the last packet sent before rendering.
Having said that, I still can’t get it to render, I fear my mod packet is wrong… but i’ve no idea why…[me=ownagesbot]thinks this is a pain in the ass but everything will become easy after he gets through this painstaking process.[/me]
